[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/misc/bank_credit_note.c

A credit note for transfering money to and from a franchise and a master shop.

Written by Pinkfish

Started Thu Jun 28 16:46:26 PDT 2001

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/object.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/shops/bank.h and /include/money.h

Method index

do_process()
This marks this credit note as processed.
is_valid_note()
This checks to see if the note is valid still or not.
query_amount()
This method returns the amount the credit note is for.
query_bank_name()
This method returns the bank name for the credit note.
query_credit_num()
This method returns the credit number id for the credit not.
query_franchise()
This method returns the franchise for the credit note
set_amount(int)
This method sets the amount the credit note is for.
set_bank_name(string)
This method sets the bank name of the credit note.
set_credit_num(int)
This method sets the credit number id for the credit note.
set_franchise(string)
This method sets the franchise that will be used as the main base for this credit note.
setup_read_messages()
This method is called to setup the read messages for the note once it is made.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
do_process
int do_process()
This marks this credit note as processed.

is_valid_note
int is_valid_note()
This checks to see if the note is valid still or not.

query_amount
int query_amount()
This method returns the amount the credit note is for.

Returns:
the amount the note is for
query_bank_name
string query_bank_name()
This method returns the bank name for the credit note.

Returns:
the bank name
query_credit_num
int query_credit_num()
This method returns the credit number id for the credit not.

Returns:
the credit id
query_franchise
string query_franchise()
This method returns the franchise for the credit note

Returns:
this returns the franchise for the note
set_amount
void set_amount(int amount)
This method sets the amount the credit note is for. +ve means that we are transporting money to the master bank, -ve means we are taking money out of the master bank.

Parameters:
amount - the amount the note is for
set_bank_name
void set_bank_name(string bank)
This method sets the bank name of the credit note.

Parameters:
bank - set the bank name
set_credit_num
void set_credit_num(int num)
This method sets the credit number id for the credit note. This will be unique for each franchise.

Parameters:
num - the credit id
set_franchise
void set_franchise(string franchise)
This method sets the franchise that will be used as the main base for this credit note.

Parameters:
franchise - the franchise as the base
setup_read_messages
void setup_read_messages()
This method is called to setup the read messages for the note once it is made.
